!+==================================================================================================
!+===================== LIST OF INPUT POINTS FOR ATMOSPHERIC N DEPOSITION ==========================
!+==================================================================================================
!+
!+ - THE VERY FIRST LINE OF THE LIST BELOW MUST CONTAIN THE NUMBER OF DIFFERENT ATMOSPHERIC SOURCES
!+
!+ - THE LIST BELOW MUST CONTAIN ON COMPLETE SET OF INPUT POINTS PER ATMOSPHERIC SOURCE
!+
!+ - THE FIRST LINE OF EACH SET CONTAINS THE IDENTIFIER OF THE ATMOSPHERIC SOURCE (INTEGER) AND THE
!+   NUMBER OF GRID CELLS *N* APPERTAINING TO THIS SOURCE
!+
!+ - BELOW THIS FIRST LINE, THE *N* MEMBERS OF THE CURRENT SOURCE MUST BE LISTED
!+
!+ - EACH SET MUST BE A CONSECUTIVE SERIES OF INTEGER VALUES
!+
!+ - THERE MUST BE NO SEPARATOR (e.g. blank line, comment etc.) BETWEEN THE DIFFERENT SETS
!+
!+==================================================================================================
!+========================================== LIST START ============================================
